attributes.action: Ban the use of new Digital Restriction Management software
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DRM software, falsely labeled "copy protection" by various media groups, has been shown to unjustifiably restrict legitimate and fair use of purchased media.

This software is mislabelled "Digital Rights Management", a mislabel due to the fact those using it have no business managing any person's rights, and can be far more accurately defined using the word "Restriction".

This software is often installed without consent or knowledge, and can cripple the legitimate use of computers to back up data.

We the people demand that usage of DRM in all forms of sold media be prohibited, for the common good.
